station.name: Dublin/Pleasanton
station.platform_info: Trains arriving at this end of line station may subsequently return to service. Always check destination signs and listen for departure announcements.
station.intro: This unique station straddles the border of Dublin and Pleasanton on Interstate 580. The station features a number of local and regional bus connections.
station.food: Nearby restaurant reviews from yelp.com
station.shopping: Local shopping from yelp.com
